scripts.clean: cmd --% /c "for %G in (types dist dist-tests build packed) do (if exist %G rmdir /s /q %G) & for %G in (.eslintcache) do (if exist %G del /f /q %G)" || rm -rf types dist dist-tests build packed .eslintcache
scripts.stage: npm run stage:clean && npm run stage:make && npm run stage:copy
scripts.stage:clean: cmd --% /c if exist packed rmdir /s /q packed || rm -rf packed
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:rebuild && npm run deploy:replace
scripts.deploy:rebuild: npm run deploy:rebuild:clean && npm run deploy:rebuild:rollup
scripts.deploy:rebuild:clean: cmd --% /c "for %G in (core lib private) do rmdir /s /q packed\%G" || rm -rf packed/core packed/lib packed/private
scripts.deploy:replace: npm run deploy:replace:header && npm run deploy:replace:resolve && npm run deploy:replace:space
scripts.deploy:replace:header: npm run deploy:replace:header:icon && npm run deploy:replace:header:share && npm run deploy:replace:header:strict
scripts.deploy:replace:resolve: npm run deploy:replace:resolve:import && npm run deploy:replace:resolve:export:default && npm run deploy:replace:resolve:export:named
scripts.deploy:replace:space: npm run deploy:replace:space:outdent && npm run deploy:replace:space:sandbox
